actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Poultry Products Inspection Act, to include chickens, turkeys, ducks, geese, guineas, pheasants, pigeons, and squabs within the definition of poultry.

summary.text: Includes chickens, turkeys, ducks, geese, guineas, pheasants, pigeons, and squabs within the definition of poultry for purposes of the Poultry Products Inspection Act. (Amends 21 U.S.C. 453(e))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Poultry Products Inspection Act, to include chickens, turkeys, ducks, geese, guineas, pheasants, pigeons, and squabs within the definition of poultry.
